thread.title: Photos: Tyler Seguin chats with a Pittsburgh defenseman; Stars top Penguins 4-1
thread.title_full: Photos: Tyler Seguin chats with a Pittsburgh defenseman; Stars top Penguins 4-1 | Dallas Morning News

author: dallasnews
title: Photos: Tyler Seguin chats with a Pittsburgh defenseman; Stars top Penguins 4-1
text: Oct 22, 2015; Pittsburgh, PA, USA; Dallas Stars center Tyler Seguin (91) exchanges words with Pittsburgh Penguins defenseman Ben Lovejoy (12) during the third period at the CONSOL Energy Center. The Stars won 4-1. Mandatory Credit: Charles LeClaire-USA TODAY Sports
